title: Junior Web Developer
job_description: Responsible for assisting in the design, development, and maintenance of websites and web applications. Work in collaboration with cross-functional teams to ensure website functionality, performance, and user experience.
job_responsibility:
1. Assist in the design and development of websites and web applications.
2. Write clean and efficient code for web applications.
3. Test and debug web applications to ensure high-quality and error-free products.
4. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and address website-related issues.
5. Optimize website performance to ensure fast loading times and seamless user experience.
6. Stay up-to-date with the latest web development trends and techniques.
7. Develop and maintain website documentation and standards.
8. Provide support and maintenance for existing websites and web applications.
educational_requirements: Associate or bachelor's degree in computer science, web development, or a related field.
experience: Minimum of 1 year of experience in web development with a strong understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and web development frameworks.
